Talon:

Talon did a weak smile and hold her baby close  the tiny Silver dra=
gon bit the air and tried to look fierce while she looked at her uncles and=
 aunts, she liked to look fierce and not allowed others to intimidate her w=
hile her little brother, the black dragon hid in her moms arms.

Talon look=
ed so tired, she varely could stay awoke

bot combat."
